A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The word anticlimactic could describe this movie in one word. The movie is called last Jedi\, but Luke then declares he is not the last Jedi!? I still think that there wasn't enough time to get to know the characters. There were some good action scenes which saves it from 1 star. But overall it felt rushed and the audience doesn't connect with characters anywhere near how they did in episodes 4-6 or 1-3
